creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: rubbing: ten full lines of tightly spaced characters in top 3/4; shorter line at L; three other shorter inscriptions written in different styles, in small text at bottom
marks: Signature, Mark, Seals, and Labels L center
title: Poem by Gyokuzan
